name: BibleVerses
0:
”Alexa, open Bible Verses”
”Alexa, start Bible Verses”
”Alexa, launch Bible Verses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible verses
des: The Bible Verses skill is your go-to Bible resource on Alexa. You have the option between either looking up a specific Bible verse or hearing the verse of the day. All verses are read in three different translations, the King James Version, the English Revised Version, and the World English Bible.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
